reviewText: This was great...the best I've seen so far but I am new at this walking thing. I felt I was right there and got a good idea what a morning walk through the city would be like. I think I could watch it several times without getting bored. Highly recommended. Also the pace was good for my walk.
Loved it!  Made me forget I was doing something boring (walking on the treadmill.)

Love,love, love this DVD! Watching on the treadmill makes you feel like you are there! Please make more of these DVD of London! Especially all the places tourist go too! Make you feel like your on vacation.

would have been nice with some dialogue (where am i, what is that place) or some music.
but over all it is okay.
More travel videos should be this good.  It was like being there.
